oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A map of Ancient Aegypt from Celarius.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Cellarius, Andreas.
oai_dc:dc.dc:format: 1 map : illustrations, hand color ; 29 x 20 cm. on sheet (37 x 23)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A map of ancient Egypt marking its cities and topography. Publication date from the library's acquisition form.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Egypt -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Nile River Delta (Egypt) -- Maps -- Early works to 1800; Early maps
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo
